name: GUCCI G8850U
desc: A stemmed glass with a slender bowl and a wide rim. It is typically used for serving cocktails that are served up (without ice).

desc: A stemmed glass with a shallow bowl and a wide rim. It is typically used for serving cocktails that are frothy or have a lot of foam

name: DIOR D6700HQ

name: PRADA P8750
desc: A tall, narrow glass that is typically used for serving sparkling wine or champagne.

name: PRADA P9700
desc: A large, stemmed glass that is typically used for serving wine.

desc: A large, hurricane-shaped glass that is typically used for serving tropical drinks, such as a Hurricane or a Mai Tai.
